title: Suzanna's Kitchen, Inc., Recalls Poultry Products due to an Unapproved Substance
summary: EDITORS NOTE: Details of this recall were updated Oct. 30, 2018 to reflect increased poundage produced. WASHINGTON, Oct. 26, 2018 Suzannas Kitchen, Inc., a Peachtree Corners, Ga. establishment, is recalling approximately 15,408 pounds of grilled chicken products due to an unapproved substance, the U.S. Department...
